quote: In a distributed system, you can know where the work is done or you can know when the work is done but you canâ€™t know both.
author: Pat Helland

quote: The contents of a message are always from the past! They are never now.
author: Pat Helland

quote: What is not surrounded by uncertainty cannot be the truth.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: One actor is no actor. Actors come in systems.
author: Carl Hewitt

quote: This is the Unix philosophy: Write programs that do one thing and do it well. Write programs to work together.
author: Doug McIlroy

quote: Cohision: the code that changes together, stays together.
author: Unknown

quote: A structure is stable if cohesion is strong and coupling is low.
author: Larry Constantine

quote: [ne of the hardest parts of computer science is naming things.
author: Phil Karlton
